Jack.name: Jack
Jack.description:
<c=0cd85d>JACK</c>
Your Military Missiler. Specializes in <c=keyword>launching</c> and <c=keyword>powering up</c> <c=midrow>missiles</c>, as well as <c=keyword>destruction</c> and <c=keyword>manipulation</c> of <c=midrow>midrow objects</c>.

description.A: Add a <c=cardtrait>temporary</c> <c=card>Backup Missile A</c> to your <c=keyword>hand</c>.

description.None: Add 1 of 2 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=0cd85d>JACK</c> cards to your hand.
description.A: Add 1 of 2 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=0cd85d>JACK</c> cards to your hand.
description.B: Add 1 of 3 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=0cd85d>JACK</c> cards to your hand.

description.None: All <c=midrow>objects</c> aligned with the enemy take a turn.
description.A: All <c=midrow>objects</c> aligned with the enemy take a turn.
description.B: All <c=midrow>objects</c> aligned with you take a turn.

description.None: Bring all <c=action>spawn</c> cards from <c=keyword>discard pile</c> into your hand.
description.A: Bring all <c=action>spawn</c> cards from <c=keyword>discard pile</c> into your hand.
description.B: Bring all <c=action>spawn</c> cards from <c=keyword>draw pile</c> into your hand.
Add 2 <c=cardtrait>temporary</c> <c=card>Target Practice B</c> to your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>.

description.None: Destroy every <c=midrow>object</c> aligned with your ship.
description.A: Destroy every <c=midrow>object</c> aligned with your ship.
description.B: Gain 1 <c=status>droneshift</c> for every <c=midrow>object</c> aligned with your ship.

SpareAmmo.name: SPARE AMMUNITION
SpareAmmo.description: At the start of the first 3 turns: If you didn't draw any <c=0cd85d>JACK</c> cards, gain <c=cardtrait>temporary</c> <c=card>Backup Missile</c>. Otherwise, gain 1 <c=status>DRONESHIFT</c>.

TripleTag.name: TRIPLE TAG
TripleTag.description: At the start of combat: Add 1 <c=card>Precision</c> to your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>, <c=keyword>discard pile</c>, and <c=keyword>hand</c>.

PreloadedBays.name: PRELOADED BAYS
PreloadedBays.description: AT the start of combat: <c=cardtrait>discount</c> all cards with a <c=action>launch</c> action by 1.

CoordinatedLaunch.name: COORDINATED LAUNCH
CoordinatedLaunch.description: The first time you spawn an object each turn: gain 1 <c=status>DRONESHIFT</c>.

NeverMissile.name: NEVER MISS-ILE
NeverMissile.description: At the end of your turn: The 2 leftmost <c=midrow>missiles</c> turn into <c=midrow>seekers</c> if they would miss otherwise.

HeavyImpact.name: HEAVY IMPACT
HeavyImpact.description: <c=midrow>Missiles</c> will trigger charges if they hit parts adjacent to them.

CrystalReticle.name: CRYSTAL RETICLE
CrystalReticle.description: At the end of your turn, convert all your <c=status>SHARD</c> into <c=status>LOCK-ON</c>. <c=downside><c=status>LOCK-ON</c> now disappears completely at the start of each turn.

ScrapArmor.name: SCRAP ARMOR
ScrapArmor.description: Gain: 1 <c=status>SHIELD</c> when you spawn an <c=midrow>asteroid</c>, 1 <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c> whne you spawn a <c=midrow>missile</c> and 1 <c=status>MAX SHIELD</c> when you spawn anything else.

SecondaryReticle.name: SECONDARY RETICLE
SecondaryReticle.description: Every 2 <c=status>OVERDRIVE</c> increases the damage of all your <c=midrow>missiles</c> by 1. Every 2 <c=status>LOCK-ON</c> increases the damage of all your attacks by 1.

AimBot.name: AIMBOT
AimBot.description: After a card with <c=cardtrait>exhaust</c> is played, apply 1 <c=status>LOCK-ON</c> to the enemy. Apply 1 <c=status>ADVANCED LOCK-ON</c> instead if the card has <c=cardtrait>single-use</c>.

SimulatedReinforcement.name: SIMULATED REINFORCEMENT
SimulatedReinforcement.description: The second time you play a <c=cardtrait>temporary</c> card each turn, add a <c=cardtrait>single-use</c> <c=card>Precision</c> to your <c=keyword>hand</c>.

MissileHeatSinks.name: MISSILE HEATSINKS
MissileHeatSinks.description: Every 3rd <c=midrow>missile</c> launched removes 1 <c=status>HEAT</c> from you. If you're at 3 or more <c=status>HEAT</c>, increase the damage of all <c=midrow>missiles</c> by 1.

ToyMissile.name: TOY MISSILE
ToyMissile.description: All cards that <c=action>launch</c> an object are also <c=cardtrait>wild</c>.

ObjectScanner.name: OBJECT SCANNER
ObjectScanner.description: At the end of each turn: Gain 1 <c=status>DRAW NEXT TURN</c> for every object in the midrow (up to 3).

LockOn.name: Lock-On
LockOn.description: Missiles do <c=damage>+{0} damage</c> to this ship. <c=downside>Decreases by 1 at the start of every turn.</c>

ALockOn.name: Advanced Lock-On
ALockOn.description: Missiles do <c=damage>+{0} damage</c> to this ship.

LoseDroneNext.name: Signal Disruption
LoseDroneNext.description: <c=downside>At the start of next turn, lose all <c=status>DRONESHIFT</c>.</c>

MidrowHalt.name: Midrow Halt
MidrowHalt.description: While you have this status, <c=midrow>midrow</c> will not take a turn. <c=downside>Decreases by 1 at the start of every turn.</c>

ClearWay.name: BAY CLEARENCE
ClearWay.description: If there's a <c=midrow>midrow object</c> blocking the bay, destroy it.

Dome.name: D.O.M.E
Dome.description: Applies <c=midrow>Bubble Shield</c> to all <c=midrow>objects</c> when destroyed. <c=downside>After 3 turns, destroying it will destroy all <c=midrow>objects</c> instead.</c> Cannot target other <c=midrow>D.O.M.Es</c>.

ClusterMissile.name: Cluster Missile
ClusterMissile.description: This missile is going to deal <c=damage>3</c> damage, when destroyed, splits into 3 <c=midrow>Mini Missiles</c>.

MiniMissile.name: Mini Missile
MiniMissile.description: This missile is going to deal <c=damage>1</c> damage.

APMissile.name: AP Missile
APMissile.description: This missile is going to deal <c=damage>1</c> <c=action>piercing</c> damage, if the part hit has <c=parttrait>armor</c>, remove it.

BlankMissile.name: Blank Missile
BlankMissile.description: This missile is going to deal <c=damage>2</c> damage, but something needs to hit it for it to activate.

BallisticMissileN.name: Ballistic Missile
BallisticMissileN.description: This missile is going to deal <c=damage>6</c> damage, will sit for 1 turn idling.

BallisticMissileY.name: Ballistic Missile
BallisticMissileY.description: This missile is going to deal <c=damage>6</c> damage, <c=downside>ready to fire.</c>
